title: The return
body: We're back. Long day. Many meetings. Good news. Very tired. Must sleep. All apologies. More later.
author: Dan

comments.author: Oz
comments.body: Glad it went well!  Can't wait to hear how you got a loan at 1% interest because they were so blown away by your business proposal!

comments.author: Chuck
comments.body: This is a relief. Figured you for dead.

comments.author: Justin
comments.body: Actually, I figured him for dead, too... only because I had severely beaten him in the head with a bowling pin.  Looks like I didn't hit quite hard enough.
